| 19 | 10, 5 | #P_cntzrec | |- ( ( ( T .(+) U ) C_ ( Base ` G ) /\ S C_ ( Base ` G ) ) -> ( ( T .(+) U ) C_ ( Z ` S ) <-> S C_ ( Z ` ( T .(+) U ) ) ) ) |
